contextId.information: A tambourine is a musical instrument like the head of a drum with pieces of metal around the side that sound when the instrument is shaken or hit. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
two thin, round metal plates that are hit together to make a loud sound (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
a flat seed, eaten like beans (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:translate_unknown]])
